attributes.action: ignore all current and future petitions against the hunting ban.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hunting for sport is a barbaric practise and I believe that British civilisation has grown beyond the need for barbarism as entertainment. Thus, the legislation banning fox-hunting should remain in place.

rejection.details:
There is already a petition on this subject you may prefer to sign:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/antihunting/
If you would prefer to launch your own, please resubmit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
